titleStmt.title: Remedies against discontentme[n]t drawen into seuerall discourses, from the writinges of auncient philosophers. By Anonymus.
titleStmt.author: Anonymus, fl. 1596.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Thomas Purfoot] for Rafe Blower,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
